name: Lombard Medical, Inc.
description: Lombard Medical, Inc. is a medical device company focused on advancing the treatment of vascular disease through innovative technology. Founded in 2007, Lombard has developed a range of products aimed at improving outcomes for patients with peripheral artery disease (PAD), particularly in the treatment of aortic aneurysms and other vascular conditions. The company is best known for its unique Aorfix™ stent-graft system, which is designed to treat abdominal aortic aneurysms (AAA) through a minimally invasive approach. Lombard's commitment to research and development has led to the creation of advanced stent technologies that enhance patient safety and efficacy. With a global presence, Lombard works closely with healthcare professionals to ensure that their products meet the highest standards and address the evolving needs of patients. The company’s mission is to improve the quality of life for patients suffering from vascular diseases by providing effective, innovative, and less invasive treatment options.

faq.answer: Lombard Medical's main products include the Aorfix™ stent-graft and other endovascular solutions.
